subtasks.name: Clean Toilet
subtasks.description: Thoroughly clean and disinfect the toilet
subtasks.tips: Don't forget to clean under the rim
subtasks.cautions: Use gloves and ensure good ventilation

subtasks.name: Clean Shower
subtasks.tips: Use a squeegee after each shower to prevent buildup

subtasks.name: Vacuum Floors
subtasks.description: Vacuum all floor surfaces in the living room
subtasks.cautions: Watch out for loose cables or small objects

subtasks.name: Clean Oven
subtasks.description: Clean inside of oven and oven racks
subtasks.tips: Let cleaner sit for recommended time before scrubbing
subtasks.cautions: Ensure good ventilation and wear gloves

subtasks.name: Clean Refrigerator
subtasks.description: Clean inside of fridge and throw out old food
subtasks.cautions: Don't use harsh chemicals on food contact surfaces
